name: Savasana with Deep Breathing
setup: Lie flat on back on comfortable surface
Arms at sides, palms facing up
Legs slightly apart, feet naturally falling open
Close eyes and settle into stillness
steps: Scan body from head to toe, consciously releasing tension
Begin slow, deep breathing through nose
Allow natural breath rhythm to emerge
If mind wanders, gently return attention to breath
Remain still and relaxed for full duration
cues: Let thoughts come and go without attachment
Feel body sinking into the floor
mistakes: Forcing breath rather than allowing natural rhythm
Trying too hard to stop thinking
safety: This is a completely passive pose. Adjust pillows under knees or head if needed for comfort.

regressions: Use bolster under knees for back comfort

prescriptionHints.notes: Complete rest and relaxation. End of practice integration.

joints.notes: Completely passive pose. Adjust props for comfort as needed.
